title: Jordan Reimschisel - The Daily Beast
author: Jordan Reimschisel
description: All Jordan Reimschisel coverage by The Daily Beast.
cleaned_text: Tale of Two Kingdoms He is behind bars after selling skin-care products made from natural ingredients without government approval. Jordan Reimschisel is a research assistant in Washington, D.C. He focuses on medical regulation and the intersection of medicine and emerging technology. His work has been featured in Forbes, RealClearHealth, and The Washington Examiner. He is behind bars after selling skin-care products made from natural ingredients without government approval.
